election_record.label: Massachusetts 1806 Governor

sub_unit.name: Alford
sub_unit.note: The votes from Alford were rejected.

sub_unit.name: New Bedford
sub_unit.note: James Sullivan received 106 votes as James Sullings.

sub_unit.name: Troy
sub_unit.note: The votes from Troy were rejected.
"Town Returns in opposition to each other." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Amesbury
sub_unit.note: "Not attested by the town clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Rowe
sub_unit.note: James Sullivan received 7 votes as Jonas Sullivan.

sub_unit.name: Cornville
sub_unit.note: The votes from Cornville were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Starks
sub_unit.note: The votes from Starks were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Reading
sub_unit.note: Edward H. Robbins received 1 vote as Edward Robbins.

sub_unit.name: Wareham
sub_unit.note: Town Records. Wareham, Book 1. 208, lists 49 votes for James Sullivan.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Massachusetts State Archives, Boston.
